comment.author: 74295538@N04
comment._content:
May be Caproni CA-58 tirmotor modified adding 2 engines and named CA-59.
Five 400 hp engines, wingspan 30 mt and 30 passengers seats on double deck.
Total weight 9.000 kg.
Informations source: Rosario Abate - STORIA DELLA AERONAUTICA ITALIANA - Editrice Bietti 1974 pag.160-161.
